Sentencas: The operation of Ni-YSZ anode supported SOFCs on methane fuel is described.
Titulo: Direct operation of solid oxide fuel cells with methane fuel

Sentencas: Power densities as high as 0.52 W/cm(2) at 700 degrees C and 1.27 W/cm(2) at 800 degrees C were observed.
Titulo: Direct operation of solid oxide fuel cells with methane fuel

Sentencas: Open circuit voltages (OCV) increased with increasing temperature to nearly 1.2 V, in good agreement with equilibrium calculations.
Titulo: Direct operation of solid oxide fuel cells with methane fuel

Sentencas: Measurements of direct-methane SOFC stability showed that at lower temperatures, <= 700 degrees C, stable operation without coking occurred over a wide range of current densities.
Titulo: Direct operation of solid oxide fuel cells with methane fuel

Sentencas: At higher temperatures, increasingly large currents were required to avoid cokin and cell failure.
Titulo: Direct operation of solid oxide fuel cells with methane fuel

Sentencas: In electrochemical impedance spectra, two electrode arcs were observed with the higher frequency arc increasing in size when the fuel was switched from hydrogen to methane.
Titulo: Direct operation of solid oxide fuel cells with methane fuel

Sentencas: Mass spectrometer measurements showed that the expected reaction products-H-2,H- H2O, CO, and CO2-all increased with increasing cell current density.
Titulo: Direct operation of solid oxide fuel cells with methane fuel

Sentencas: The dominant products at 800 degrees C were H-2 and CO, in agreement with thermodynamic predictions.
Titulo: Direct operation of solid oxide fuel cells with methane fuel

Sentencas: Reasons for stable coke-free direct methane operation are discussed.
Titulo: Direct operation of solid oxide fuel cells with methane fuel
